release.action: Applied a patch from Her van de Vliert which fixes Double response tag of SearchLDAPResponse.
Support for scripts with extension '.script' and '.javascript'
Migrating the connector to opensource model.
Fixed a StackOverflowError with recursive WSDL imports.
Fixed the configuration page for BOP-4
Added additional arguments to scheduleSoapRequest to only save request or response
SOAP request timeout parameter added to the configuration page.
TransactionId parameter for GetSavedSoapTransactions method now supports wild-cards: mytxn* or my?xn*
SOAP:Fault was not passed correctly through from an external web service.
When saving SOAP transactions to file, the element namespace is written too (e.g. the XML is now valid for SOAP:Faults too).

First release of the 1.1 branch. This release works with C3 and up. Changes include: Mozilla Rhino Javascript engine updated version 1.7R1, which includes a better support for E4X extension. Some of the old script which rely on non-standard functionality (e.g. StubTestResponse.child(0)) might not work and have to be upgraded.
Initial support for Java6 scripting API. The script engine and interface jars must be added to the classpath manually.
